name: AZRA_LVL
displayName: Librarian Level

name: CLASSES_UNLOCKED
displayName: Defender Classes unlocked (not counting Librarian)

name: STARS_BLUE
displayName: Blue Stars earned from battles

name: STARS_GOLD
displayName: Gold Stars earned from battles

name: UNIQUE_WEAPONS
displayName: Unique weapons earned in standard game

name: UPGRADED_WEAPONS
displayName: Unique weapons upgraded in new game+

name: UNIQUE_ARMOR
displayName: Unique armor earned in standard game

name: UPGRADED_ARMOR
displayName: Unique armor upgraded in new game+

name: BOOKS_NORMAL
displayName: Books earned from bonus battles in standard game

name: BOOKS_PLUS
displayName: Books earned from bonus battles in new game+

name: ALL_BOOKS
displayName: Total number of books

name: ENDLESS_WAVE_NORMAL
displayName: Maximum wave reached on Endless Challenge 2 in standard game

name: ENDLESS_WAVE_PLUS
displayName: Maximum wave reached on Endless Challenge 2 in new game+

name: CASUAL_GOLDS
displayName: How many levels you've perfected on Casual

name: NORMAL_GOLDS
displayName: How many levels you've perfected on Normal

name: ADVANCED_GOLDS
displayName: How many levels you've perfected on Advanced

name: EXTREME_GOLDS
displayName: How many levels you've perfected on Extreme

name: BEAT_GAME_NORMAL_PROGRESS
displayName: Beat the standard game

name: BEAT_GAME_PLUS_PROGRESS
displayName: Beat the game in new game+

name: BEAT_GAME_NORMAL_HERO_MODE_PROGRESS
displayName: Beat the standard game without any generic recruits

name: BEAT_GAME_PLUS_HERO_MODE_PROGRESS
displayName: Beat the game in new game+ without any generic recruits

name: SUPER_SHEEP_BEATEN
displayName: Beat the super sheep level in standard game

name: SUPER_SHEEP_PLUS_BEATEN
displayName: Beat the super sheep level in new game+

name: SIDEQUESTS_BEATEN
displayName: Number of side quests beaten in new game+, on any challenge setting

name: SKILLS_LVL_1
displayName: Points spent on level 1 skills

name: SKILLS_LVL_2
displayName: Points spent on level 2 skills

name: SKILLS_LVL_5
displayName: Points spent on level 5 skills

name: SKILLS_LVL_10
displayName: Points spent on level 10 skills

name: SKILLS_LVL_15
displayName: Points spent on level 15 skills

name: SKILLS_LVL_20
displayName: Points spent on level 20 skills

name: BOOST_TECH_5_EVENT
displayName: Number of times you've boosted a character to level 5 and thereby unlocked their 5th technique.

name: MENU_ACCESS_EVENT
displayName: Number of times you've visited the accessibility menu (options->accessibility)

name: MENU_CONTROLS_EVENT
displayName: Number of times you've visited the controls menu (options->controls)

name: USE_TARGETS_NORMAL
displayName: Number of times you've used a normal targeting option

name: USE_TARGETS_ADVANCED
displayName: Number of times you've used an advanced targeting option

name: MENU_TIPS_EVENT
displayName: Number of times you've visited the tips menu (overworld->tips)

name: STARS_GOLD_HERO_MODE
displayName: Number of gold stars earned from battles without any generic recruits
